abstract.para: The intended readers of this document are users using eXo Platform. This user guide explains all the basic and advanced features of eXo Platform by providing a series of in-depth examples and clear explanations which help users easily benefit from the eXo Platform capabilities and features.
This documentation is divided into the following chapters:

listitem.para: A list of glossaries commonly used in applications of eXo Platform, interface of eXo Platform 3.5, and how to manage your accounts and language.
Instructions on how to manage your profiles and spaces, build networks and follow activities in your network.
Instructions on how to perform actions in Wiki, Forum, and FAQs.
Instructions on how to perform actions to enhance communication and collaboration through emails, address books, chat and calendars.
Instructions on how to structure your content, manage content, newsletters and workflows.
Instructions on how to manage users, groups and memberships in eXo Platform.
A collection of portal-based actions, allowing you to manage permissions, sites/portals, navigation nodes, pages and applications.
